subject: Re: [sugar] FW: Touchpad XO
body:
Dafydd Harries wrote:
> One simple way to represent the buttons in documents would be to use the shape
> of the button: the button on the left has a curve on the left, and the button
> on the right has a curve on the right.

That's an excellent idea.

Or perhaps you could use the two half-circles that the two ends of the 
button look like. So the left button's symbol would be a filled C 
semicircle and the right button would be the mirror image.

Gerv
